gameDetails.description:
Brettspiel Adventskalender 2018 Promo. Day 7

Using:
Each round, up to 3 times, you may pay 1 tea leaf of general supply and use it as if it were either an iron ore OR a stone as part of resolving an action. In addition, before placing your first worker of the round you may pay 1 chai to get your third worker form the Tea Stall and use it this round.
